text: Also on an added note, say if I have to fetch the subscriptions of a user and append it to the body in my custom actions, is pre_fetch_option prefeered or pre_action_execution?

Is there any official guidance on why field values from associated objects can’t be added directly as a property for a Custom Code action? You can make them available by passing them through a Format Data node without changing anything — I don’t really see how that’s any different than exposing them directly. Is there some subtle nuance that I’m missing?
